alert.note: Alert for Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 7:15AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Sebastian, northeastern Haskell, Sequoyah and northeastern Le Flore Counties through 800 AM CDT... At 715 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 3 miles west of Sallisaw to 2 miles southwest of Gans to 6 miles south of Cameron. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Sallisaw... Poteau... Greenwood... Pocola... Muldrow... Roland... Spiro... Arkoma... Vian... Panama... Mansfield... Hackett... Howe... Hartford... Huntington... Bonanza... Bokoshe... Midland... Gans... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 296 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 8 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
